                                function ColorLuminance(hex, lum) 
                                {
                                    // validate hex string
                                    hex = String(hex).replace(/[^0-9a-f]/gi, '');
                                    if (hex.length  < 6) 
                                    {
                                        hex = hex[0]+hex[0]+hex[1]+hex[1]+hex[2]+hex[2];
                                    }
                                    lum = lum || 0;
                                    
                                    // convert to decimal and change luminosity
                                    var rgb = "#", c, i;
                                    for (i = 0; i  < 3; i++) 
                                    {
                                        c = parseInt(hex.substr(i*2,2), 16);
                                        c = Math.round(Math.min(Math.max(0, c + (c * lum)), 255)).toString(16);
                                        rgb += ("00"+c).substr(c.length);
                                    }
                                    return rgb;
                               }

div.span: FIT for Purpose is owned by Season & Vine Ltd who also own Capital Centric. FIT for Purpose in an online booking platform designed for travel industry professionals.

span.div: Capital Centric offers a personal and bespoke booking service for groups of any size and most budgets and we are totally dedicated to placing restaurant groups across the UK and in Scotland.

From June 2014 we also offer a unique online booking service for your FIT’s. F.I.T for Purpose, our tailor made online service is available to our Trade Partners and gives instant availability and confirmation for a wide range of venues.

To access our online service please visit www.fitforpurposeonline.com. You can register as an operator or, if you are a restaurant, please complete the application form you will find at the bottom left hand side (click on the link - Restaurant sign up)

Capital Centric was created in March 2009 by Janie Clarke. For many years Janie worked with a national restaurant group, growing their trade and corporate sales business, working closely with Operators, Chefs and Travel Trade and Corporate clients.

Capital Centric handpicks their restaurant partners and works with them to offer their client’s groups good value and outstanding service. We believe in creating great working relationships that last.
If you would like to make an enquiry please use our enquiry form
If you are a restaurant that would like to be considered for listing with us please send an email to info@capitalcentric.co.uk
